design_philosophy.description: A CRM that feels like the interior of a luxury car‚Äîergonomic, precise, and distraction-free. We move away from generic 'SaaS Blue' to a sophisticated Slate & Electric Blue palette with high-contrast data visualization.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Outfit' for all H1-H4. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight: SemiBold (600) or Bold (700).
usage_rules.body: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all UI text. High legibility. Base size: 15px (text-[15px]).

primary.description: Slate 900 - Deep, premium dark blue/black. Used for primary actions and sidebar.

secondary.description: Slate 100 - Used for secondary buttons and backgrounds.

accent.description: Blue 600 - Electric Blue. Used for active states, links, and key highlights.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

grid_strategy.dashboard: Bento Grid. Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 tiles.
grid_strategy.client_list: Dense Table with sticky header. Row height: 64px.
grid_strategy.forms: Single column on mobile, 2-column grid on desktop (gap-8).

sidebar.style: Fixed left. Dark mode (Slate 900) for contrast against light content area.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-xl hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 h-10 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 rounded-lg h-10 text-sm

modals.content: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-2xl rounded-2xl p-0 overflow-hidden

status_badge.style: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium border

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50' for sticky headers.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Add a subtle noise texture to the dark sidebar to give it a 'dashboard' feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for cards, 'shadow-lg' for dropdowns/modals. Avoid 'shadow-xl' unless for floating elements.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for separation. Use 'divide-y divide-slate-100' for lists.

login_hero.description: Modern bright car showroom interior. Use as background for Login page (with overlay).

salesperson_avatar.description: Professional salesperson. Use for demo user profile or 'Welcome' widget.

success_state.description: Handing over car keys. Use for 'Deal Closed' or 'Success' empty states.

empty_state_clients.description: Cars in parking lot. Use for 'No Clients Found' state.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Automotive Precision' theme. Keep it clean, fast, and professional. Do not use gradients for backgrounds, stick to solid colors or subtle noise.
instructions_to_main_agent.bilingual_implementation: Ensure all text labels are wrapped in a translation function or hook. Toggle between EN/ES must be seamless.
instructions_to_main_agent.appointment_logic: The color coding for appointments is CRITICAL. Do not deviate from the specified hex/tailwind classes for statuses.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: Use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for validation. Forms should be split into logical sections (Personal Info, Employment, Co-Signer).
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile: Ensure the 'Agenda' and 'Client List' are fully usable on mobile (stack columns, use drawers instead of modals where appropriate).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
